title: The designers of the new ‘Apex Legends’ map want to help you die less
description: "Apex Legends: Eclipse” will launch Nov. 1 with Broken Moon, which has a new zip rail system and larger points of interest to reduce dogpiling during drops.

title: FTC brings action against CEO of alcohol delivery company over data breach
description: The FTC's rare decision to put Drizly CEO under order signals a new approach to privacy enforcement under Chair Lina Khan.

title: Two alleged Chinese intelligence officers accused of trying to buy info about federal prosecution
description: Complaint accuses two alleged Chinese spies of money laundering and attempting to obstruct an investigation into a China-based telecommunications company.

title: NASA proved it can deflect an asteroid. But spotting them is tricky.
description: The space agency is working to develop an telescope that would track many more potentially hazardous asteroids, but the project has faced funding cuts.

title: She clicked sign-in with Google. Strangers got access to all her files.
description: Should you log in with Facebook or Google on other sites or apps? Short answer: No.
